document.full_text: ben zobrist set a tampa bay record with eight runs batted in, hitting a homer and two two-run doubles to open a doubleheader.
document.title: baseball roundup: zobrist sets rays' r.b.i. record and routs twins all by himself
lines_and_colors: ben zobrist set a tampa bay record with eight runs batted in, hitting a homer and two two-run doubles to open a doubleheader.
